titleStmt.title: By the King a proclamation commanding the gentry to keepe their residence at their mansions in the countrey, and forbidding them to make their habitations in London, and places adioyning.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Robert Barker, Printer to the Kings most Excellent Maiestie: and by the Assignes of Iohn Bill,

notesStmt.note: "Giuen at the Court at Greenwich, the twentieth day of Iune, in the eighth yeere of the Reigne of our Soueraigne Lord, Charles, by the grace of God King of England, Scotland, France and Ireland, Defender of the Faith, &c."
Reproduction of original in: Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.

person.persName: the Kings most Excellent Maiestie: and
